name: Chuanyi Li
content: 李传艺 Chuanyi Li Menu Ph.D, Assistant Professor Software Institute State Key Laboratory for Novel Software and Technology Nanjing University Room 917, Fei Yimin Building 22 Hankou Road, Gulou District, Nanjing, China lcy@nju.edu.cn lcynju@126.com Education 2012.09~2017.06, Ph.D, Professor Bin Luo, Nanjing University, Nanjing, China. 2016.02~2017.02, Visiting Student, Associate Professor Liguo Huang, Southern Methodist University (SMU), Dallas, Texas, US. 2008.09~2012.06, B.Sc, Nanjing University, Nanjing, China. During my visit in SMU, I met my enlightment teacher in Machine Learning and Natural Language Processing (NLP), Professor Vincent Ng from University of Texas at Dallas (UTD), Texas, US. From then on, NLP applications have become my new research interest. Nanjing University State Key Lab for Novel Software Technology Software Institute Department of Computer Science and Technology
